channel.title: Making a huge tutorial
channel.description:
[center] alright so i am going to make a really big tutorial. i am planing on having it be a SRL based tutorial. i am going to have each procedure of SRL defined to as how to use it and what it will do. then i am going to have different procedures picked apart to show how they work. and of coarse at the begining there will be all of the basic stuf flike variables and constants and stuff.
i am looking for people to help me with it. if there is a part of SRL that you know really well then you could write somthing up about it or somthing. any contributions would be greatly appreciated and will be noted at the top of the page. thanks to anyone that will help
also if you have a procedure that you would allow ma/us to use to show how some things work that would be noted in the credits too. thanks much [/center]

item.title: Making a huge tutorial
item.dc:creator: @Infintry001 Infintry001
item.description:
@Infintry001 wrote:

[me=Infantry001] thinks that me tags are weird, but should be used anyways.[/me][me=Infantry001] also doesn’t want to get banned for spamming, so will post something ontopic.[/me]

Its a good idea, but there are already descriptions of every function in SRL, so not needed.

Read full topic

item.title: Making a huge tutorial
item.dc:creator: @premier premier
item.description:
@premier wrote:

[center]
alright so i am going to make a really big tutorial. i am planing on having it be a SRL based tutorial. i am going to have each procedure of SRL defined to as how to use it and what it will do. then i am going to have different procedures picked apart to show how they work. and of coarse at the begining there will be all of the basic stuf flike variables and constants and stuff.

i am looking for people to help me with it. if there is a part of SRL that you know really well then you could write somthing up about it or somthing. any contributions would be greatly appreciated and will be noted at the top of the page. thanks to anyone that will help

also if you have a procedure that you would allow ma/us to use to show how some things work that would be noted in the credits too. thanks much
[/center]

Read full topic
